title: Forex focus: China could have a knock-on effect for all of us
text: Forex focus: China could have a knock-on effect for all of us What impact will the turmoil in the Chinese economy have on expats? A teller counts yuan banknotes in a bank in China: the central bank has recently devalued the currency Photo: STR/AFP/Getty Images
